price: Wabashirie wanaafiki kwamba watapata adhabu chungu,.
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
footnotes: Ewe Mtume Mtukufu! Waonye wanaafiki kwamba Siku ya Kiyama watapata adhabu chungu yenye kuumiza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
